item.title: Trump's Son Invests Millions in Polymarket
item.description: On August 26th, according to the report of AXIOS, Donald Trump Jr., the son of former President Trump, invested tens of millions of dollars in Polymarket.

item.title: A certain Bitcoin ancient whale has deposited 968 BTC into Hyperliquid, and is currently selling and exchanging it for ETH.
item.description: On August 26th, as monitored by LookOnChain, 30 minutes ago, a particular Bitcoin ancient whale deposited 968 BTC into Hyperliquid (approximately $106.44 million), and is currently in the process of selling BTC to purchase ETH spot.

item.title: The Trump Media & Technology Group has acquired $105 million in CRO and will stake it through Crypto.com
item.description: On August 26th, as per the report from Blockworks, Trump Media & Technology Group announced a strategic partnership agreement with Crypto.com. This is advancing their collaboration through a parallel collaboration and purchase agreement.Under the terms of the agreement, Trump Media will adopt Crypto.com's wallet system to upgrade their in-app rewards program. Users will be able to convert their earned "gems" into Cronos (CRO) tokens, which can then be used to pay for subscription fees. Additionally, opening a Crypto.com account will offer free or discounted Truth+ subscriptions.Trump Media & Technology Group signed a $155 million strategic partnership agreement with Crypto.com. The group has purchased approximately $105 million worth of CRO, which is about 685 million tokens. These tokens will be held and staked through Crypto.com. Furthermore, Crypto.com has acquired $50 million in common shares from Trump Media & Technology Group. Both parties' holdings are subject to a lock-up p

item.title: Trump Media & Technology Group Rises 4.36% in Pre-market Trading
item.description: On August 26th, based on market data, the stock of Trump Media & Technology Group (DJT.O) surged by 4.36% at the market opening and is now trading at $17.96.Previously reported, Yorkville Acquisition Corp., Trump Media & Technology Group, and Crypto.com announced that the three parties have signed a definitive agreement to establish a digital asset treasury company, Trump Media Group CRO Strategy, Inc., which is focused on acquiring the native cryptocurrency token (CRO) of the Cronos ecosystem.

item.title: Canary Submits TRUMP ETF's S-1 Filing to the SEC
item.description: On August 26th, according to market information, Canary has presented the S-1 application document for the TRUMP ETF to the US SEC.

item.title: A certain Bitcoin ancient whale sold 1000 BTC and went long over 96,000 ETH with 5x leverage
item.description: On August 26th, based on LookOnChain's monitoring, a Bitcoin ancient whale sold an additional 1000 BTC (approximately $1.0968 billion) two hours ago at an average price of $109,684.Subsequently, they initiated a long position with 96,452 ETH (approximately $433 million) using 5 times leverage.

item.title: Arbitrum Multi-Sig Address Deposited 13.105M ARB to Coinbase Prime, Approximately $6.91M
item.description: On August 26th, as per Ashes Monitor, a multi-signature wallet under the control of Arbitrum deposited 13.105 million ARB (approximately $6.91 million) into Coinbase Prime 45 minutes ago.

item.title: CEA Industries: BNB Reserve Holdings Increase to Over 350,000 Coins
item.description: On August 26th, as per Globenewswire, CEA Industries Inc. (NASDAQ: BNC) declared today that the current cumulative holding has surpassed 350,000 BNB, thereby further strengthening its standing as the world's leading BNB treasury company.

item.title: Flow Traders is a CRO Market Maker and Financial Services Provider
item.description: On August 26th, as per on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), Flow Traders, which is a market maker for CRO and a financial service provider, has withdrawn a cumulative total of 607 million CRO (valued at $60.47 million) from Crypto.com over the past 4 months. At present, 98.8% of the tokens have been transferred to contract addresses related to BitGo.

item.title: Kanye West's Personal Instagram Account Hacked to Promote Fake Token Project
item.description: On August 26th, Kanye West made a post on social media indicating that his personal Instagram account had been hacked and was used to follow a fake token project. The official project account for YZY is @YZY_MNY.
